resume.title: Sutlan Aldabal
resume.objectives: Intelectually curious M.D psychiatrist seeking to apply to a Children's Psychiatry Ward in London, United Kingdom. I would like to gain experiences in the facility for about 3-4 years, then start my own personal practice outside. Focuses include improving the mental health of adolecents. My passions include helping others, problem solving people's issues, and advocating for self care.

job.job_summary: Ran sub-set of experiments involving the cognition of adolecents and childrn ages 8-18. Expanded on many theories on sense perception and child development. Utilized many modern equipment and can easily learn how to operate new devices. Mastered time management, record keeping, writing research papers.

Expanded on theories involving mental illnesses and disabilities in adults aged 18-25 and children aged 11-17. Lead weekly group discussions. Ran a class once a week in fall 2006 as a T.A.; developmental psychology. Mastered newer techonology. Funding from Saudi Government started in October 2005. Won the David Shakow Early Career Award for Distinguished Scientific Contributions to Clinical Psychology in 2008.
Conducted expirements on the cells that control behaivior in humans. Discovered many different functions of different brain cells

qualifications.education: B.A. in Behaivioral Neuroscience in Northeastern University, Boston MA
PhD in Stanford University, Stanford, CA

affiliations.affiliation: Saudi Arabian Society of Clinical Psychology since 2005

report.p: Peer review report will go here.
